categories: Category:Jedi Masters of the Jedi Order

nodes.text: Vonkhel was a Jedi Master who befriended the Sith Lord of Gairm. During the reign of the Galactic Empire, the antiques dealer Antron Bach remembered the story of the unlikely friendship while trying to reassure himself about approaching a downed starfighter, which he thought might contain a pirate or another dangerous individual.

Vonkhel was first mentioned in "The End of History", a short story written by Alexander Freed and published in Star Wars Insider 154 in 2014. The character's gender and species were not revealed in the story.
